content.rendered:
Hello friends! We now offer a tip jar during check out!! This is for everyone who would like to tip our team for their hard work doing what we do 🙂

We don’t have any expectations for tips, but if you feel like showing us some monetary love, you now can ♡

The tips get split evenly among the team ^_^

Love y’all!! Thank you for supporting our small business!

Tip jar artwork done by fuzzzbrain on IG
